attributes.action: bestow a Knighthood upon Ryan Giggs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For his exceptional professionalism and contribution to sport.  Ryan Giggs is the most decorated player in the history of English football and thoroughly deserves the recognition of his contibution to and achievements in the sport that a Knighthood would bring.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours: www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
